We have openings for VxD/UxD/IxD across our multi-platform user experience offering for Audible.com ... We are specifically looking for motivated premium experience focused designers in New York/New Jersey to help build the best immersive audio subscription service ever.

If you are interested, I am accepting resumes/CVs, portfolio links and emails of interest... Just send a note to jpfields[at]audible[dot]com. Its a pivotal time to be joining the design team here and be part of the next phase in our product and brands development.

http://www.amazon.jobs/team/audible

Thanks!
